Name: Verify Adding a Single Item to Cart
Precondition: User is logged in and on the product page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to saucedemo home Page and User Login with Valid User and Pass
2. Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Backpack".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to saucedemo Page and User Login with Valid User and Pass
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User should be navigate to home Page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: 2. Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Backpack".

Name: Verify Adding Multiple Items to Cart
Precondition: User is logged in and on the product page.
Test Data: Products: Sauce Labs Backpack, Sauce Labs Bike Light
Test Steps:
1. Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Backpack".
2. Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Bike Light".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Backpack".
Click "Add to cart" on the "Sauce Labs Bike Light".

Name: Verify Viewing Items in Cart
Precondition: User has added items to the cart.
Expected Result: User sees a list of all items in the cart.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User sees a list of all items in the cart.

Name: Verify Removing a Single Item from Cart
Precondition: User has items in the cart.
Expected Result: The item is removed from the cart.
Test Steps:
1. Click on the cart icon.
2. Click "Remove" next to the "Sauce Labs Backpack".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: 1. Click on the cart icon Where is Product Selected
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The cart page opens, displaying the items in the cart.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: 2. Click "Remove" next to the "Sauce Labs Backpack".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The item is removed, the cart updates

Name: Verify Clearing All Items from Cart
Precondition: User has multiple items in the cart.
Expected Result: Cart icon updates to not showing the shopping cart badge.
Test Steps:
1. Click on the cart icon.
2. Remove each item one by one.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The cart page opens, displaying all items currently in the cart.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: 2. Remove each item one by one.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Test Data: Sauce Labs Backpack, Sauce Labs Bike Light
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Each item is removed sequentially, the cart updates after every removal.

Name: Verify Proceeding to Checkout with Cart Items
Precondition: User has items in the cart.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the checkout page.
Test Steps:
1. Click on the cart icon.
2. Click "Checkout".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The cart page opens, displaying the items currently in the cart.

The checkout page is displayed, prompting the user to enter their shipping 
and payment details to complete the purchase.
